text: Working in the creation of MaaS products as a frontend developer as part of the development team as a UX/UI designer for both web and apps.

I was responsible for the Quality department in Auto, Home, and Life insurance lines. My role included coordinating and training a team of 132 employees and new recruits. I actively participated in the development of action plans aimed at achieving the established objectives.
text2: Additionally, I played a key role in efficiently resolving claims to ensure customer satisfaction.
